name: Adrift (ziggy5000)
description:
This game was made for the Global Games Jam of 2021.

This years theme was lost and found

What is the game

You are Crewmen 029, you have been stranded for the past 2 years after an accident took place on the space station - Happy Accidents

The AI companion, Terry, has updated you that someone has found your SOS! This your chance to Power up the Comms Array and contact them...Bad news it will take 10 days to reach you and Terry just found a leak in the Oxygen filters.

Don't forget to care for yourself, these manual Crack Generators don't leak radiation but require effort to start up.

Being Adrift sucks

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Esc or 9 - Quit the game

Contributors
